name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Detoxifier: Delay Shorts & Block Recommendations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block YouTube Shorts addiction, Remove recommendations, comments and auto-quit YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove Recommendations and Comments: The extension provides a distraction-free browsing experience by allowing you to remove YouTube recommendations and comments.

Timeout Feature: To reduce the addictive nature of YouTube videos and shorts, the extension provides a timeout feature. It also helps in preventing you from endlessly scrolling YouTube shorts.

Break Feature: Need a break from the distraction blocker? The extension includes a break feature that allows you to temporarily disable the settings. During this break, you can study or simply chill out without the restrictions. You can also set custom break durations and configurations.

Link to GitHub repo: https://github.com/Divij-Agarwal-42/Distraction-blocker
